T02D1881:109b-1: shr'i sa m'a dza aa bhi sa ma ya na' ma sa' dha nam /
T02D1881:109b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus ba'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1881:109b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1881:110a-1: por bsam gtan gyi khang ba yid dang rjes su
T02D1881:110a-2: mthun pa shin tu spen par stan 'jam po la
T02D1881:110a-3: 'dug ste // 'gro ba drug gi sems can thams
T02D1881:110a-4: cad la blos ba ltas la byams pa'i sems bskyed
T02D1881:110a-6: de rnams phol mig la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang //
T02D1881:110a-7: de'i rgyu mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yin par byas te //
T02D1881:110a-8: de nas snying rje'i sems bskyed pas gsungs pa'i blos gnod pa de bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1881:110a-9: bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur nas sems can
T02D1881:110a-10: rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya'o zhes
T02D1881:110a-11: smon lam bya'o de nas bsgom pa'i sbyor ba brtsam
T02D1881:110a-12: par bya ste / rang gi snying gar yi ge
T02D1881:110a-13: aa yongs su gyur ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1881:110a-14: yi ge mam mdog ser po bsams nas /
T02D1881:110a-15: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas lnga rnams dang /
T02D1881:110a-16: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02D1881:110a-17: slob dpon mdun du nam mkha' la bsams te //
T02D1881:110a-18: snying po 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i gzugs
T02D1881:110a-19: rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D1881:110a-21: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1881:110a-22: de la tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1881:110a-23: gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du //
T02D1881:110a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1881:110a-25: de nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo stong ba nyid rnam par bsgoms la //
T02D1881:110a-26: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1881:110a-27: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1881:110a-28: de nas sems gcig pu nyid ni bsod nams dang
T02D1881:110a-29: ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par gnyis su 'gyur
T02D1881:110a-30: te // aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba ni 'jug ba'o //
T02D1881:110a-31: so sor snang ba'i bdag nyid can ni smon ba'o //
T02D1881:110a-32: de la yang bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur nam dun du
T02D1881:110a-33: yi ge a'a:las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams
T02D1881:110a-34: la / de'i steng du yi ge h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rje drag po nag po bsams te /
T02D1881:110a-35: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bgegs bsal bar bsams la //
T02D1881:110a-36: de nyid kyis rdo rje dra bar byas ba'i chos
T02D1881:110a-37: 'byung dkar po gru gsum nang stong ba gyen kar
T02D1881:110a-38: 'dug ba'o // de'i 'og logs su yi ge aa
T02D1881:110b-0: @110b yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1881:110b-1: 'dug ba'o // // yi ge bam yongs su gyur
T02D1881:110b-2: pa las sna tshogs padma'i sting du zla ba la
T02D1881:110b-3: kham ljang gu yongs su gyur ba las sna tshogs
T02D1881:110b-4: 'dug ba'o // // rdo rje // der zla ba
T02D1881:110b-5: la br'u yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo yi
T02D1881:110b-7: de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po zhal g-yas gnag pa //
T02D1881:110b-9: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa //
T02D1881:110b-10: g-yas na 'khor lo ral gri dang //
T02D1881:110b-11: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa //
T02D1881:110b-12: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02D1881:110b-13: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'dod mnga' ba //
T02D1881:110b-14: rin po che'i cod pan can bsams la /
T02D1881:110b-15: de'i ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od zer rnams
T02D1881:110b-16: kyis sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul nas bcug
T02D1881:110b-17: la // de yongs su gyur pa las khang pa
T02D1881:110b-18: brtsegs pa zur bzhi pa la sogs pa dang yang
T02D1881:110b-19: dag par ldan pa bsams la //
T02D1881:110b-20: de'i dbus ma'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la stong pa
T02D1881:110b-21: nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo aa la sogs pa
T02D1881:110b-22: yongs su gyur pa'i zal ba de rnams kyis mtshan
T02D1881:110b-23: pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1881:110b-24: de'i steng su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
T02D1881:110b-25: rtsa gnyis 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ka la sogs pa
T02D1881:110b-26: yongs su gyur ba las de rnams kyis mtshan pa'i
T02D1881:110b-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ni rin chen 'byung
T02D1881:110b-29: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po ste /
T02D1881:110b-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang yi ge h'um las
T02D1881:110b-31: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po gyur pa las
T02D1881:110b-32: yi ge h'um gis mtshan pa ni snang ba mtha'
T02D1881:110b-34: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul nas bcug ste //
T02D1881:110b-35: de'i nga rgyal du byas pa dang ldan pa'i rnal
T02D1881:110b-36: 'byor ba ni don yong grub pa'i rnam pa ste
T02D1881:110b-37: / de yongs su gyur ba las rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bdag nyid bsam pa ni /
T02D1881:110b-39: zhal g-yas gnag / g-yon dmar pa /
T02D1881:110b-40: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa //
T02D1881:110b-41: g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02D1881:110b-42: g-yon rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1881:110b-43: rin po che'i rtsod pa na dang /
T02D1881:110b-44: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1881:111a-0: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs @111a * //
T02D1881:111a-1: pa'i skur bdag nyid bsams la /
T02D1881:111a-2: sems can rnams 'dod chags chen pos 'dul bar shes
T02D1881:111a-3: nas dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras sangs rgyas rnams bdag
T02D1881:111a-5: de la spyan ma la sogs pa dgu'i gzugs kyis
T02D1881:111a-6: rang gi lha mo'i nang du chud par byas nas
T02D1881:111a-7: ; de nas yi ge h'um gi 'od zer rnams
T02D1881:111a-8: kyis sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul nas khar
T02D1881:111a-9: ; bcug ste / rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung la /
T02D1881:111a-10: padma'i nang du byang chub kyi sems rnam par blta ste /
T02D1881:111a-11: de yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor du bsams la /
T02D1881:111a-12: sems can ma lus pa yid kyis rab tu bcug ste /
T02D1881:111a-13: de byang chub kyi sems su yongs su gyur nas /
T02D1881:111a-14: rdo rje'i lam nas nges par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1881:111a-15: de nas de br'um a'am dz'im kham h'um /
T02D1881:111a-20: zhes bya ba'i yi ge las byang ba'i rnam par
T02D1881:111a-21: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1881:111a-22: cad padma'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo'i ba
T02D1881:111a-23: spu'i bu ga nas blos dbyang ngo //
T02D1881:111a-24: de ltar sems can gyi khams rnam par dag nas /
T02D1881:111a-25: h'um las 'od zer byung bas yi ge ho gnyis
T02D1881:111a-26: dang aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i 'jug pa'i sems
T02D1881:111a-27: spel ba bkug la khar bcug ste /
T02D1881:111a-28: rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas byang chub
T02D1881:111a-29: sems kyi rnam par lha mo'i padma'i nang du babs
T02D1881:111a-30: pa dang / de'i 'od zer rnams kyis reg pa
T02D1881:111a-31: tsam gyis rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas
T02D1881:111a-33: de nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mor gyur pas /
T02D1881:111a-34: sems can khams na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glus bskul bar bsam mo //
T02D1881:111a-35: 'di rnams kyis yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1881:111a-36: sems kyis 'od zer de 'byung ba zhi dang sangs
T02D1881:111a-37: rgyas thams cad kyis bskul nas sangs rgyas zhugs par
T02D1881:111a-38: gyur pa las rang rang gi sngags kyi gzugs su
T02D1881:111a-40: de yongs su gyur pa las ral gri yi ge mam gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1881:111a-41: de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sku mdog ser po //
T02D1881:111b-0: zhal g-yas nag po g-yon dkar po @111b phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:111b-1: g-yas na ral gri dam pa dang /
T02D1881:111b-2: g-yon na autpala dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02D1881:111b-3: zla ba'i 'od dang rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1881:111b-4: sna tshogs padma'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D1881:111b-5: de'i snying gang zla ba la ral gri /
T02D1881:111b-6: de'i dbus su de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar zla ba la ral gri /
T02D1881:111b-7: de'i dbus su yi ge mam gnas par bsams la /
T02D1881:111b-8: ao dharmma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1881:111b-9: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1881:111b-10: 'di dag ni mchog gi bsnyen pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:111b-11: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chung ba'o //
T02D1881:111b-12: de'i mig tu zla ba la kshim dkar po yongs
T02D1881:111b-13: su gyur pa las 'khor lo kshim gis mtshan pa'o
T02D1881:111b-14: // de gnyis yongs su gyur pa las sa'i snying po sku mdog dkar po //
T02D1881:111b-16: phyag gnyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:111b-17: g-yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri /
T02D1881:111b-18: g-yon na nor bu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:111b-19: de bzhin du rna ba la yi ge dzrim dang
T02D1881:111b-20: bcas pa'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las phyag
T02D1881:111b-21: na rdo rje sku mdog nag po /
T02D1881:111b-22: zhal g-yas dkar po g-yon dmar /
T02D1881:111b-23: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa'o ;
T02D1881:111b-24: / g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02D1881:111b-25: g-yon rin po che dang padma'o //
T02D1881:111b-26: de bzhin du sna la yi ge kham dang bcas
T02D1881:111b-27: pa'i rin po che yongs su gyur pa las nam
T02D1881:111b-28: mkha'i snying po sku mdog ser po //
T02D1881:111b-29: zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:111b-30: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:111b-31: g-yas na rin po che dang gri /
T02D1881:111b-33: de bzhin du lce la yi ge gam dang bcas
T02D1881:111b-34: pa'i padma yongs su gyur pa las 'jig rten dbang
T02D1881:111b-36: zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:111b-37: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:111b-38: g-yas na padma dang ral gri /
T02D1881:111b-39: g-yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:111b-40: de bzhin du mgo la yi ge kam kam dang
T02D1881:111b-41: bcas pa'i ral gri yongs su gyur pa la sgrib
T02D1881:111b-42: pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog ljang
T02D1881:111b-43: gu / zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:112a-1: gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:112a-2: g-yas na ral gri dang 'khor lo /
T02D1881:112a-3: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:112a-4: de bzhin du lte ba la yi ge sam dang
T02D1881:112a-5: bcas pa'i rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las kun
T02D1881:112a-6: du bzang po sku mdog dkar po /
T02D1881:112a-8: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:112a-9: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02D1881:112a-10: g-yon na rin chen dang padma bsnams pa ste //
T02D1881:112a-11: sa'i snying po la sogs pa 'di rnams kyang zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od dang /
T02D1881:112a-12: rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1881:112a-13: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs ba'o //
T02D1881:112a-14: de dag ni mchog gi nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:112a-15: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chud du'o //
T02D1881:112a-16: kun du bzang po'i steng du zla ba la yi
T02D1881:112a-17: ge h'um nag po yongs su gyur ba las rdo
T02D1881:112a-18: rje'i lte ba la h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
T02D1881:112a-19: yongs su gyur pa las thugs rdo rje phyag na
T02D1881:112a-20: rdo rje lta bu thugs ka'i zla ba la yi
T02D1881:112a-22: lce rtser yi ge a'a:yongs su gyur pa las padma'i
T02D1881:112a-23: lte ba la yi ge a'a:dang bcas pa'i padma yongs
T02D1881:112a-24: su gyur pa las gsung rdo rje 'jig rten dbang
T02D1881:112a-25: phyug lta bu'o // de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge a'a:dmar po'o //
T02D1881:112a-26: dpral bar yi ge aom yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1881:112a-27: 'khor lo'i lte bar aom dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1881:112a-28: yongs su gyur pa las sku rdo rje sa'i snying
T02D1881:112a-29: po lta bu'o // de'i thugs kar zla ba la
T02D1881:112a-30: yi ge aom dkar po snying po de rnams kyi
T02D1881:112a-31: 'od zer gyis thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i sangs
T02D1881:112a-32: rgyas rnams yang dag par mchod nas dpal ldan rdo
T02D1881:112a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod de /
T02D1881:112a-35: yang dag par bskul la sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1881:112a-36: de dag ni mchog gi bsgrub pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:112a-37: skyes bu byed ba'i 'bras bu chung ngu'o //
T02D1881:112a-38: snying po'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad bskul
T02D1881:112a-39: ba dang nge rnams kyis 'od zer btang ba'i sgo
T02D1881:112a-40: nas byung ba'i spyan ma la sogs pa'i rigs rnams
T02D1881:112a-41: kyi rin po che'i bu ma ba nas bdud rtsis
T02D1881:112a-42: dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1881:112a-43: rang gi rigs kyi bdag po cod pan du thogs pa'o //
T02D1881:112a-44: de dag ni mchog gi sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:112b-1: yan lag bzhi pa'i dang po'o //
T02D1881:112b-2: rnal 'byor pa mchog gi bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1881:112b-3: yan lag 'di dag gis rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1881:112b-4: 'bring po la sogs pa ni rang dang 'dra bar
T02D1881:112b-5: bskyed par bya'o // gzhan yang aom h'um sv'a a'a:h'a
T02D1881:112b-6: zhes bya ba'i yi ge las bskyed par byas te
T02D1881:112b-7: bskyed par bya'o // / de'i mgo dang /
T02D1881:112b-12: rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro //
T02D1881:112b-13: yi ge h'um las padma a'a:las lte ba /
T02D1881:112b-14: phat las dbab pa dgag pa'o //
T02D1881:112b-15: bdag nyid kyis yang yi ge h'um las rdo rje /
T02D1881:112b-16: aom las nir bu phat kyis dgag pa'o //
T02D1881:112b-17: de nas snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyis bskul la drangs te /
T02D1881:112b-18: de dang lhan cig sngags pas dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1881:112b-19: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sba bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1881:112b-20: yan lag bzhi pa'i gnyis pas te /
T02D1881:112b-21: 'di dag ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1881:112b-22: snying po'i gsang sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams bskul la bkug nas khar bcug ste /
T02D1881:112b-23: lha mo'i 'dod chags kyis zla ba zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1881:112b-24: padma'i nang du phab pa las byung ba'i rang gi
T02D1881:112b-25: sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bdag po dbus
T02D1881:112b-26: na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor ba bsams la cho ga
T02D1881:112b-28: badzra dhrik ces bya ba las mi bskyod pa bskul te /
T02D1881:112b-29: sku mdog nag po zhal g-yas dkar ba /
T02D1881:112b-31: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:112b-32: g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02D1881:112b-33: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1881:112b-34: nyi ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1881:112b-35: ral pa dang cod pan can /
T02D1881:112b-36: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa dngos po thams cad kyi bdag la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1881:112b-37: dzin dzik ces bya bas rnam par snang mdzad dgod de /
T02D1881:112b-38: sku mdog dkar po zhal g-yas gnag gyon dmar ba /
T02D1881:112b-39: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:112b-40: g-yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri //
T02D1881:112b-41: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1881:112b-42: zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1881:112b-43: shar gyi padma la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D1881:112b-44: ratna dhrik ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-0: sku mdog ser po zhal g-yas @113a * //
T02D1881:113a-2: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-3: g-yas na rin po che dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113a-4: g-yon na 'khor lo dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1881:113a-6: a'a ro lik ces bya bas 'od dpag tu med pa dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-8: / zhal g-yas gnag / g-yon dkar rab /
T02D1881:113a-9: phyag gnyis kyi shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-10: g-yas na padma dang ral gri //
T02D1881:113a-11: g-yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa /

T02D1881:113a-15: zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:113a-16: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-17: g-yas na ral gri dang 'khor lo //
T02D1881:113a-18: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1881:113a-20: 'di rnams nyi ma'i gdan dang nyid ma'i 'od dang na bza' dang rgyan bzang po dang /
T02D1881:113a-21: ral pa dang cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1881:113a-22: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1881:113a-23: mo ha ra t'i zhes bya bas shar lhor spyan ma dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-25: zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1881:113a-26: phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-27: g-yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113a-28: g-yon na rin po chen dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:113a-29: dve sha ra t'i zhes bya ba la lho nub tu m'a ma k'i dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-30: sku mdog nag po zhal g-yas dkar ba /
T02D1881:113a-32: phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-33: g-yas na autpala dmar po dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113a-34: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa'i //
T02D1881:113a-35: r'a ga ra t'i zhes bya ba las nub byang du gos dkar mo dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-36: sku mdog dmar mo zhal g-yas gnag / g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:113a-37: phag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-38: g-yas na padma dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113a-39: g-yon na nor bu dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:113a-40: badzra ra t'i zhes bya ba las byang shar du sgrol ma dgod de /
T02D1881:113a-42: zhal g-yas gnag / g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:113a-43: phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113a-44: g-yas na autpala ser bo dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113a-45: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:113a-46: phyir rom gyi shar lhor de kho na nyid gsum
T02D1881:113b-0: las gzugs rdo rje sa'i snying po @113b lta bu
T02D1881:113b-1: me long la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1881:113b-2: de bzhin du lho nub tu sgra rdo rje phyag
T02D1881:113b-3: na rdo rje lta bu la bi wang la sogs
T02D1881:113b-5: de bzhin du nub byang du dri rdo rje nam
T02D1881:113b-6: mkha'i snying po lta bu la dri'i dung chos la
T02D1881:113b-8: de bzhin du byung shardu ro rdo rje 'jig rten
T02D1881:113b-9: dbang phyug lta bu la thod pa la sogs pa
T02D1881:113b-10: dang ldan pa'o // shar gyi sgo'i g-yon du reg
T02D1881:113b-11: rdo rje sgrib pa rnam par sel ba lta bu
T02D1881:113b-12: la lha'i gos sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1881:113b-13: shar gyi sgo'i g-yas su chos kyi dbyings rdo rje
T02D1881:113b-14: kun du bzang po lta bu la chos 'byung ba
T02D1881:113b-15: la sogs pa dang ldan te /
T02D1881:113b-16: lha mo bcu po de rnams ni zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1881:113b-17: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1881:113b-18: rin po che'i cod pan dang na bza' po dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1881:113b-19: ya m'anta krita ces bya ba las shar phyogs kyi
T02D1881:113b-20: sgor gshin rje gshed dgod de sku mdog nag po
T02D1881:113b-21: // zhal g-yas dkar g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1881:113b-22: phyag gnyis kyi shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113b-23: g-yas na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i tho ba dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113b-24: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:113b-25: pradzny'a nta krita ces bya ba las lho phyogs kyi sgor shes rab mthar byed dgod de /
T02D1881:113b-27: zhal g-yas gnag / g-yon dmar ba /
T02D1881:113b-28: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113b-29: g-yas na rin po che sa mtshan pa'i dbyig pa dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113b-30: g-yon na rin po che dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D1881:113b-31: padm'anta krita ces bya ba las nub phyogs kyi sgor padma mthar byed dgod de /
T02D1881:113b-33: zhal g-yas gnag g-yon dkar ba /
T02D1881:113b-34: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113b-35: g-yas na padma dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113b-36: g-yon na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'i //
T02D1881:113b-37: bighn'anta krita ces bya ba las byang phyogs kyi sgor bgegs mthar byed dgod de /
T02D1881:113b-41: phyag gnyis kyis shes rab dam pa la 'khyud pa /
T02D1881:113b-42: g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri /
T02D1881:113b-43: g-yon na rin po chen dang padma bsnams pa ste /
T02D1881:113b-44: khro bo 'di rnams nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1881:113b-45: khro bo'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1881:113b-46: stag gi pags pa man bas pa /
T02D1881:114a-3: aag tshom dang spyan ser ba /
T02D1881:114a-4: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1881:114a-7: de ltar dngos po thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02D1881:114a-8: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes
T02D1881:114a-9: kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs nas
T02D1881:114a-11: de rnams dang ldan cig 'ongs pa'i bgegs gshin rdze gshed la sogs pas bskrad pa dang /
T02D1881:114a-13: bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1881:114a-14: bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod kyi mchog yon phul la /
T02D1881:114a-15: snying po'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje
T02D1881:114a-16: rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D1881:114a-17: mchod cing / gshin rdze gshed la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gsang sngags kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D1881:114a-21: de dag ni thun mong gi bsnyen pa'i yan lag ste ;
T02D1881:114a-22: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o //
T02D1881:114a-23: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1881:114a-24: lha rnams kyi mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs
T02D1881:114a-25: pa ni / spyi'i nye bar bsgrub pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:114a-26: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o //
T02D1881:114a-27: de bzhin du sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D1881:114a-28: spyi'i sgrub pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:114a-29: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o //
T02D1881:114a-30: de nyid gzhan du dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni /
T02D1881:114a-31: sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'chang ba dang /
T02D1881:114a-35: shes rab mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed kyi cod pan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1881:114a-36: spyan dang gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1881:114a-37: gshin rde gshed kyi cod pan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1881:114a-40: padma mthar byed kyi cod pan la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1881:114a-41: sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje'i cod pan la ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1881:114a-42: dri'i rdo rje'i cod pan la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1881:114a-43: 'di dag ni spyi'i sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste /
T02D1881:114a-44: dbang gi 'bras bu chen po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i gsum pa'o //
T02D1881:114a-45: snying po'i 'od zer rnams kyi sangs rgyas rnams bskul la khar bcug ste /
T02D1881:114a-46: rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas /
T02D1881:114b-0: @114b lha mo'i chags pas padma'i nang du zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs can du bsams la /
T02D1881:114b-1: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa phyung bas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1881:114b-2: aom sarbba ta th'a ga p'u badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1881:114b-3: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1881:114b-4: de nas rang gi yid lhag pa'i lhar gyur pa las chos rnams kyi //
T02D1881:114b-5: mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che //
T02D1881:114b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i stong pa'i sgra brag ca lta bur bstod pa byed par bsam mo //
T02D1881:114b-7: de nas bdud rtse myang ba'i cho ga 'di yin te /
T02D1881:114b-8: yi ge yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi
T02D1881:114b-9: dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu la ba dan gyis
T02D1881:114b-10: mtshan pa / du ba'i mdog can yi ge yam dang bcas pa /
T02D1881:114b-11: de'i steng du yi ge ram yongs su gyur pa
T02D1881:114b-12: las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum zur gsum la rdo
T02D1881:114b-13: rjes mtshan pa'i yi ge ram dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1881:114b-14: de'i steng du zla ba la yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las thod pa'o //
T02D1881:114b-15: der sngags pas bi mu shu ma ra ste bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1881:114b-16: go ku da ha na ste dpa' bo lnga bkod la /
T02D1881:114b-17: rlung gis bskyod pa'i mes thod pa de la gnas
T02D1881:114b-18: pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur par bsams la
T02D1881:114b-19: / der yi ge h'um las rdo rjer gyur pa yang nang du bsam mo //
T02D1881:114b-20: yang yi ge aom gyis de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
T02D1881:114b-21: sa bon drangs la 'dres par gyur par byas nas
T02D1881:114b-22: / der yi ge gsum mngon par bzlas la rnal
T02D1881:114b-23: 'byor pas h'um bkod pa'i rdo rje'i lce bzang po
T02D1881:114b-24: / dang / de lta rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D1881:114b-25: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1881:114b-26: snying po las nges par byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1881:114b-27: kyis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa spangs
T02D1881:114b-28: pas de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba rnams byas nas
T02D1881:114b-29: rang gi sa bon gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D1881:114b-30: theg le'i gzugs su rang gi yid yongs su bsgoms la /
T02D1881:114b-31: sems de'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i snang bas sku
T02D1881:114b-32: dang gsung dang thugs dang lus kyi mchog gi bar
T02D1881:114b-34: yang de nyid du zhugs pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam mo //
T02D1881:114b-35: des nang gi lus dang bzhin du thams cad snang par byas te /
T02D1881:114b-36: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas byung ba'i mtha'
T02D1881:114b-37: yas pa'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams kyis sna tshogs pa
T02D1881:115a-2: brtan par gyur pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1881:115a-3: de nas rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas bcug la /
T02D1881:115a-4: rdo rje'i lam nas nges par phyung nas zla ba zhu par gyur pa las /
T02D1881:115a-5: de yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma phra mo'i lte bar ting nge 'dzin gnyis bskyed la ;
T02D1881:115a-6: sna tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du rang gi sngags kyis nang du bcug la /
T02D1881:115a-7: thig le de'i gzugs can 'od gsal bar bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D1881:115a-8: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la bltas la
T02D1881:115a-9: sems brtan par gyur nas rjes su dran pa bcu
T02D1881:115a-11: bsgoms pas dub na cig car ram rim gyis sems ma yengs par bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-12: rang gi rgyud tshim par bya ba bsam pa ni
T02D1881:115a-13: mtho gang gis spags pa la spyi bo'i steng du
T02D1881:115a-14: gdugs dkar po bzhin bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D1881:115a-16: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bdud rtsi phab la /
T02D1881:115a-17: de nas srog gi rlung dang rang gi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis drangs nas /
T02D1881:115a-18: rkan gyi phyogs su phab nas ba spu'i khung bu
T02D1881:115a-19: dang rtsa brgyad las sku gsung thugs tshim par byas
T02D1881:115a-20: / de nas bzlas pa dpag cu med par byas nas /
T02D1881:115a-21: aom la sogs pa de kho na nyid gsum gyis
T02D1881:115a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus la yang dag pa'i
T02D1881:115a-24: de nas rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas
T02D1881:115a-25: sangs nas thams cad kyi de dang 'dra bar bsams
T02D1881:115a-27: bdud rtsi myang ba'i rin gyis zas la sogs pa spyad par bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-28: dbang bskur ba'i rim pas khrus bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-29: rgyu mthun pa 'bring po la sogs pas grong gi chos bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-30: thun mtshams su yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par spros la /
T02D1881:115a-31: mchod pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bzlas pa byas nas /
T02D1881:115a-32: yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus la nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-33: yang nang par gyi dus su bskyed pa'i rim gyis
T02D1881:115a-34: ting nge 'dzin gsum rdzogs par byas la mnyam par
T02D1881:115a-35: gzhag nas bzlas brjod la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1881:115a-36: bsgom pa'i cho ga 'di ni shes rab dman pa'i sems can mthong nas /
T02D1881:115a-37: slob dpon gyis 'di nyid gsar du brtsams pa yin no //
T02D1881:115b-0: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par @115b rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1881:115b-1: slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1881:115b-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma dang /
T02D1881:115b-4: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
T02D1881:115b-5: bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te slad kyis kyang bcos
